Package io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper

Interface RunHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextBlobBuilderRunHandler, TextLineRunHandler
    public interface RunHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void beginLine()
      Called when beginning a line.
      void commitLine()
      Called when ending a line.

    • Method Detail

      • beginLine

        void beginLine()
        Called when beginning a line.

      • runInfo

        void runInfo​(RunInfo info)
        Called once for each run in a line. Can compute baselines and offsets.

      • commitRunInfo

        void commitRunInfo()
        Called after all runInfo(io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper.RunInfo) calls for a line.

      • runOffset

        io.github.humbleui.types.Point runOffset​(RunInfo info)
        Called for each run in a line after commitRunInfo().
        Returns:
        an offset to add to every position

      • commitRun

        void commitRun​(RunInfo info,
               short[] glyphs,
               io.github.humbleui.types.Point[] positions,
               int[] clusters)

        Called for each run in a line after runOffset(io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper.RunInfo).

        WARN positions are reported from the start of the line, not run, only in Shaper.makeCoreText https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=10898

        Parameters:
        positions - put glyphs[i] at positions[i]
        clusters - clusters[i] is an utf-16 offset starting run which produced glyphs[i]

      • commitLine

        void commitLine()
        Called when ending a line.
